warn.advancedchat.savefirst: Any unsaved changes will be lost when pressed!
config.advancedchat.name: Filter Name
config.advancedchat.info.name: What the filter appears as, only cosmetic.
config.advancedchat.info.active: Whether the filter should be filtering chat.
config.advancedchat.info.findstring: What the filter looks to find.
config.advancedchat.info.findtype.litera: Literal: Matches exactly what String to find is
config.advancedchat.info.findtype.regex: Regex: Interperets String to find as a regular expression.
config.advancedchat.info.replacetype.onl: OnlyMatch: Only replaces what triggers the filter.
config.advancedchat.info.replaceto: String that replaces what you have set for Replace Type.
config.advancedchat.info.notifytype.none: None: Doesn't notify you when the filter gets triggered.
config.advancedchat.info.notifytype.soun: Sound: Plays a sound when the filter gets triggered.
